
```{r}
library("devtools")
devtools::install_github("VCCRI/CIDR")
library(cidr)
```

```{r}
scData = scSimulator(N=3, k=50)
scData_without_dropouts = scData$expectedValues
scData_with_dropouts = scData$dropoutsSimulated
write.csv(scData_without_dropouts, "scdata_without_dropouts.csv")
write.csv(scData_with_dropouts, "scdata_with_dropouts.csv")
```
